Atalanta Vs Man City: Pep Krisis Kiper, Bahaya Lawan Liverpool
07 Nov 2019, 06:36 by Non Koresponden , Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tak ada jeda yang terlalu lama buat Pep Guardiola setelah membawa Manchester City bermain 1-1 di kandang Atalanta dinihari tadi, Kamis 7 November 2019, dalam fase grup Liga Champions Eropa. “Ketika kami mendarat di Manchester, kami akan berpikir tentang pertandingan berikutnya dalam Liga Primer (Inggris),” katanya. Mereka ditunggu Liverpool akhir pekan ini.
Seharusnya Manchester City sudah lolos ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions jika menang dinihari tadi. Penyerang Raheem Sterling sudah membuat City memimpin 1-0 pada menit ketujuh. Tapi, dalam babak kedua, menit 49, setelah kiper Ederson cedera sehingga diganti Claudio Bravo, Mario Pasalic menyamakan skor Atalanta.
City juga bisa unggul 2-0 dalam babak pertama kalau saja penyerang Gabriel Jesus tidak gagal dalam mengeksekusi tendangan penalti.
Tapi, Guardiola tak akan berlama-lama memikirkan performa timnya dalam Liga Champions. Apalagi, mereka masih unggul lima angka di klasemen grup.
Mantan manajer Barcelona ini harus segera menyiapkan susunan pemain yang tepat dalam lawatan penting ke Anfield pada Minggu ini, 10 November 2019.
Liverpool sudah lebih dulu sehari bermain di Liga Champions dengan mengalahkan Genk, sehingga lebih lama istirahatnya untuk menghadapi pertadingan besar akhir pekan ini melawan juara bertahan yang tercecer di belakang The Reds dengan selisih enam poin.
Belum diketahui apakah Ederson bisa segera pulih dari cederanya. Claudio Bravo sebagai kiper kedua dinihari tadi dan terkena kartu merah pada menit ke-81. Bek kanan, Kyle Walker, yang awalnya masuk menggantikan Riyad Mahrez, malah tampil lebih bagus dibandingkan Bravo ketika menjadi kiper dadakan.
Pertandingan d Anfield, Minggu ini, adalah pertarungan yang keras. Tapi, Pep Guardiola kemungkinan masih lebih percaya kepada pemain kawakan Fernandinho sebagai bek tengah darurat dibandingkan John Stones. Dinihari tadi, Fernandinho berpasangan dengan Nicolas Otamendi sebagai bek tengah.
Pep sudah kehilangan bek tengah Aymeric Laporte, gelandang senior David Silva, dan penyerang Leroy Sane yang belum pulih dari cedera.
Lini tengah City di Anfield akhir pekan ini tampaknya membutuhkan kebangkitan performa Kevin de Bruyne. Sedangkan di lini depan, Raheem Sterling yang tampil bagus dinihari tadi kemungkinan besar akan kembali menjadi andalan Pep di Anfield didampingi Jesus atau penyerang kawakan Sergio Aguero.
Manchester City memang tidak boleh kalah dari Liverpool pada Minggu ini, 10 November 2019, di Stadion Anfield, kalau mereka tak mau semakin tersengal-sengal untuk bisa mengurangi selisih raihan poin dari The Reds di puncak klasemen.

Atalanta Vs Man City: Pep Goalkeeper Crisis, Danger Against Liverpool
Nov 7 2019, 06:36 by Non Correspondent, Prasetyo Day
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - There is no break too long for Pep Guardiola after bringing Manchester City to play 1-1 at home to Atalanta earlier this morning, Thursday 7 November 2019, in the European Champions League group phase. "When we land in Manchester, we will think about the next match in the Premier League," he said. They awaited Liverpool this weekend.
Manchester City should have qualified for the last 16 of the Champions League if it won earlier this morning. Forward Raheem Sterling has given City a 1-0 lead in the seventh minute. But, in the second half, 49 minutes, after goalkeeper Ederson was injured and replaced by Claudio Bravo, Mario Pasalic equalized Atalanta's score.
City could also lead 2-0 in the first round if only striker Gabriel Jesus did not fail in executing a penalty.
But, Guardiola will not linger thinking about the performance of his team in the Champions League. Moreover, they are still five points ahead in the group standings.
The former Barcelona manager must immediately prepare the right lineup for an important trip to Anfield this Sunday, 10 November 2019.
Liverpool had already played in the Champions League for the first day by beating Genk, so they took a longer break to face this weekend's big match against defending champions who were scattered behind the Reds by six points.
It is not yet known whether Ederson can recover from his injury soon. Claudio Bravo as the second goalkeeper earlier this morning and was hit by a red card in the 81st minute. Right-back, Kyle Walker, who initially came on for Riyad Mahrez, appeared better than Bravo when he was an impromptu goalkeeper.
The match at Anfield this Sunday was a tough fight. But, Pep Guardiola is still more likely to trust veteran Fernandinho as an emergency central defender than John Stones. At dawn earlier, Fernandinho was paired with Nicolas Otamendi as a central defender.
Pep has lost center back Aymeric Laporte, senior midfielder David Silva, and striker Leroy Sane who has not recovered from injury.
City's midfield at Anfield this weekend seems to require a revival of Kevin de Bruyne's performance. While on the front lines, Raheem Sterling, who performed well in the early hours of the day, will most likely return to being a mainstay of Pep at Anfield accompanied by Jesus or veteran attacker Sergio Aguero.
Manchester City really can't lose to Liverpool this Sunday, November 10, 2019, at Anfield Stadium, if they don't want to be wheezing to be able to reduce the difference in achievement points from the Reds at the top of the standings.
